sait.cprg311.application

Class Melody

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.cprg311.application.Melody

  • public class Melody
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    Oct 24 2015 Class Description: Application that can play an octave up from the note specified by the user via the command line. It validates user input and sends a corresponding message in case of an error.
    Author:
    awassill

        public Melody()

    • Method Detail

      • playNote

        private void playNote(Note note)
        Method to play the note passed as an argument.

      • runMelody

        public void runMelody()
        Method to validate user input into a valid note, form an octave, and play the notes. Otherwise sends an error message to the user.
